mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(DATE '2024-12-01', LEVEL - 1), 'YYYY-MM') AS "yearMonth" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), DATE '2024-12-01') + 1 ORDER BY TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(DATE '2024-12-01', LEVEL - 1), 'YYYY-MM') desc
SELECT info_no as "no" , info_sn as "sn" , info_nm as "name" FROM equipment_info WHERE info_useyn = 'Y' ORDER BY info_buy_date DESC

SELECT common_detail_code AS "code" , common_detail_name AS "name" FROM common_detail WHERE REGEXP_REPLACE(COMMON_DETAIL_CODE, '[0-9]') = 'MNTP' AND common_detail_status = 'Y' ORDER BY common_detail_display

SELECT hsty_no AS "hstyNo" , TO_CHAR(info_no) AS "infoNo" , hsty_type AS "hstyType" , TO_CHAR(hsty_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "hstyDate" , hsty_dtl AS "hstyDtl" , hsty_prfr AS "hstyPrfr" , TO_CHAR(hsty_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "regDate" , TO_CHAR(hsty_mdfn_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "mdfnDate" , 'select' AS "rowType" FROM equipment_history ORDER BY hsty_date DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO equipment_history ( hsty_no , info_no , hsty_type , hsty_date , hsty_dtl , hsty_prfr , hsty_reg_date
) VALUES ( equipment_history_seq.NEXTVAL , TO_NUMBER(#{infoNo}) , #{hstyType} , TO_DATE(#{hstyDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #{hstyDtl} , #{hstyPrfr} , CURRENT_DATE )
